Welcome: Welcome to the Console Draw game!
ChooseBoardSize: Please, choose size of the board (or it will be set as 50x20)
Draw:
Enter 1 to draw a Simple dot
Enter 2 to draw a Vertical Line
Enter 3 to draw a Horizontal Line
Enter 4 to draw 'V'
To Clear board enter:
ThankYouForPlaying: Thank you for playing! Press any button to quit
ChooseHorizontalLength: Please enter horizontal length of the board:
ChooseVerticalHeight: Please enter vertical height of the board:
